auth_need_key: A BeamMP key is required to start the server!
GUI_need_key_message:
A BeamMP key is required to start the server!
Do you want to open the link in a browser to obtain the key?
GUI_cannot_open_browser:
Failed to open browser.
Use this link: {}
web_start: WebAPI started at {} (Press CTRL+C to quit)
man_message_man:
man - Displays help page for COMMAND.
Usage: man COMMAND
man_message_help:
help - Displays the names and short descriptions of commands.
Usage: help [--raw]
The `help` command displays a list of all available commands and a brief description of each command.
help_message_help: Displays the names and short descriptions of commands.
man_message_stop:
stop - Stops the server.
Usage: stop
man_message_exit:
exit - Stops the server.
Usage: exit
